sentences.en: a pair of Bermudas
sentences.cn: 一条百慕大短裤

sentences.en: a pair of bloomers
sentences.cn: 一条短灯笼裤

sentences.en: a pair of skis
sentences.cn: 一副滑雪板

sentences.en: A pair of teenage boys were smoking cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 两个十来岁的男孩正在吸烟。

sentences.en: earrings, £5 a pair
sentences.cn: 耳环，5英镑一副

sentences.en: Eventually they reached a pair of ornately carved doors.
sentences.cn: 他们最终来到一扇雕刻精美的对开门前。

sentences.en: He and Paula made an unlikely pair.
sentences.cn: 他和葆拉不太可能成为一对儿。

sentences.en: He put on a pair of short pants and an undershirt.
sentences.cn: 他穿上了一条短裤和一件汗衫。

sentences.en: His surgical instruments were a knife and a pair of pincers.
sentences.cn: 他的外科手术器械是一把刀和一把钳子。

sentences.en: Men and teenage girls pair up to dance.
sentences.cn: 男人和少女结伴跳舞。

sentences.en: On the mantelpiece are a pair of bronze Ming vases.
sentences.cn: 壁炉台上是一对明代的青铜花瓶。

sentences.en: She fished out a pair of David's socks for her cold feet.
sentences.cn: 她找出一双戴维的袜子穿在了冰冷的脚上。

sentences.en: She picked up a pair of scissors from the windowsill.
sentences.cn: 她从窗台上拿起一把剪刀。

sentences.en: The Heidlers are an unpleasantly hypocritical pair.
sentences.cn: 海德勒夫妇很虚伪，很让人讨厌。

sentences.en: The pair of them were both blinded by their own cockiness.
sentences.cn: 他们两个人都因为自己的狂妄而变得盲目。

sentences.en: The pair surrendered to him like lambs.
sentences.cn: 那两个人乖乖地向他投降。

sentences.en: The pair were in sombre mood.
sentences.cn: 这两个人情绪低落。

sentences.en: The trainees will then be paired with experienced managers.
sentences.cn: 这些实习生之后将被配给有经验的经理们。

sentences.en: we can always do with an extra pair of hands.
sentences.cn: 我们从不反对多一个人帮忙。

sentences.en: We have five pairs of free tickets to give away.
sentences.cn: 我们有五套双人票要免费送出。

sentences.en: We were each paired with a newcomer to help with training.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人都和一名新手组对，帮助他们训练。

words.tran_cn: 配对；摞合；[机] 双层轧制

trans.tran_cn: 一双，分两个相连接部分的物体，一对（两个…），一起拉车的两匹马
trans.tran_en: an object that is made from two similar parts that are joined together
to put people or things into groups of two, or to form groups of two
